channel.title: GoCD-API on Nikhil Bhat
channel.description: Recent content in GoCD-API on Nikhil Bhat

item.title: GoCD Golang SDK
item.description: This Library could be helpful while building any tools around GoCD or while interacting with GoCD to perform certain daily activities. Which could include checking the health of all agents connected to GoCD or status of a job and many more.
